sent.orig: The bloke shook his head stubbornly.
sent.trans: 这个家伙很顽固地摇头。

sent.orig: He's a dodgy bloke I wouldn' t trust him an inch.
sent.trans: 他是个诡计多端的家伙--我一点都不相信他。

sent.orig: Come on, it's one thing for a bloke to show up alone.
sent.trans: 行了，参加舞会这种事，如果男孩子一个人去挺傻的。

sent.orig: While we were talking, a bloke came up.
sent.trans: 我们正在谈话，一个人走了过来。

sent.orig: You're that bloke off the telly!
sent.trans: 你是电视上的那个傻小子！
